mapper.sql: USERID, USERNAME, USERTYPE, PASSWORD, USERSTATUS, ADDRESS, ZIPCODE, TELEPHONE, EMAIL
mapper.insert: insert into T_USERMANAGEMENT (USERID, USERNAME, USERTYPE, PASSWORD, USERSTATUS, ADDRESS, ZIPCODE, TELEPHONE, EMAIL) values (#{userID,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{userName,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{userType,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{userStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{zipCode,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{telePhone,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{EMAIL,jdbcType=CHAR})
mapper.select:
select
from T_USERMANAGEMENT where USERTYPE = #{userType,jdbcType=CHAR} order by userID
